plot outline: The story revolves a girl was born in a family where they do not wish for a female child. She aspired to be a civil servant but lacks family support except for her grandfather. However, her difficult time begins when she loses her grandfather.
title: Beti Kyare Boj Nathi Hoti
plot: The story revolves a girl was born in a family where they do not wish for a female child. She aspired to be a civil servant but lacks family support except for her grandfather. However, her difficult time begins when she loses her grandfather.
